text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
“Arima Kinen” concludes this year's Twinkle series, and the main 
character is the “Triple Crown Horse Girl” Narita Brian!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
The confrontation with Biwa Hayahide was regrettably not granted, 
but her sister will challenge this big stage carrying her 
feelings on her back!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
However, for Narita Brian, it's her first 
mixed match with the senior class!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Against first-class veterans, will this fifth crown Horse Girl 
get her 5th victory in this honored G1 race!?

Even on this big stage, you seem to 
be able to concentrate firmly.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't know how long this concentration will last. I want to run 
quickly with my whole body.

Biwa Hayhahide isn't in today's race, so many opponents' single 
aim will be to mark you.

Biwa Hayhahide isn't in today's race, so many opponents' single 
aim will be to mark you.

But, you know that's not a problem. Show me a run that is far 
beyond everyone's imagination today!

But, you know that's not a problem. Show me a run that is far 
beyond everyone's imagination today!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You don't need to tell me, I will go.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hehe… I caught up to you, Narita Brian!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
“Arima Kinen” is a big race where only fierce people gather. 
Still, I will run against you alone!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Because I regard you as the strongest! Narita Brian, the 
competition with me… don't run away.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…That's good, I will become your opponent. 
Come at me with all your might.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: ーNow, Each Horse Girl is at the gate.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Will the “Triple Crown Horse Girl” Narita Brian 
win, or is there a Horse Girl who puts a blunder 
on it, “Arima Kinen” ーNow, it's a start!
